verbose_text: The underlying mechanism may be related to its ability to stimulate PPAR-gamma expression and activation because some of the PPAR-gamma agonists like pioglitazone and rosiglitazone under the pharmacological class of thiazolidinedione have been demonstrated to inhibit AGE accumulation in clinical studies [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: PPAR-gamma agonists like pioglitazone and rosiglitazone under the pharmacological class of thiazolidinedione have been demonstrated to inhibit AGE
